sql.if:
EXISTS ( SELECT n.current_node FROM t_node_relation n WHERE 1=1
and n.node_seq like '%'
and n.node_seq like CONCAT('${params.nodeSeq}','%')
and A.channel_no = n.current_node
and A.agent_no = n.current_node
) AND

EXISTS ( SELECT n.current_node FROM t_node_relation n WHERE 1=1
and n.node_seq like '%'
and n.node_seq like CONCAT('${params.nodeSeq}','%')
and A.organ_no = n.current_node ) AND

mapper.select:
select organ_no as A_organ_no,total_profit as A_total_profit,total_actual_amount as A_total_actual_amount,(total_profit-total_actual_amount) as A_balance from ( select A.*,IFNULL((select sum(IFNULL(B.actual_amount,0)) from t_organ_withdrawals B where A.organ_no = B.organ_no),0) as total_actual_amount from ( select agent_no organ_no,sum(IFNULL(total_profit,0)) as total_profit from t_hierarchical_settlement_total where agent_no is not null group by agent_no UNION select channel_no organ_no,sum(IFNULL(total_profit,0)) as total_profit from t_hierarchical_settlement_total group by channel_no ) A )A
order by ${orderBy}

select count(*) from ( select A.*,IFNULL((select sum(IFNULL(B.actual_amount,0)) from t_organ_withdrawals B where A.organ_no = B.organ_no),0) as total_actual_amount from ( select agent_no organ_no,sum(IFNULL(total_profit,0)) as total_profit from t_hierarchical_settlement_total where agent_no is not null group by agent_no UNION select channel_no organ_no,sum(IFNULL(total_profit,0)) as total_profit from t_hierarchical_settlement_total group by channel_no ) A )A
